text: @realDonaldTrump Mr. present, the COVID-19 is a international outbreaking , not "Chinese Virus". Actually if you did more actions like two weeks ago, any action like Chinese government did in the past 2 month, we will not get into such horrible situation, Shelter in palace, I feel shame for you.
